feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Budi 9294/project apps in client by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16173
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16212
  • Fix memory issues locally by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16214
  • Workspace apps frontend CRUD by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16127

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.1...3.12.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix undefined reference while adding your first screen by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16223

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.2...3.12.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make sure sensitive settings aren't shown through the API. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16215
  • Revert "Remove ACCOUNT_PORTAL_API_KEY." by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16227
  • Some remaing test conversions to ts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16231
  • Strip user information if the user does not need it by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16216
  • Use default values when empty string is passed by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16233

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.5...3.12.6
